General.Name: Guangdong Tianan New Material
General.Description: Guangdong Tianan New Material Co., Ltd. develops, manufactures, and sells polymer composite finishing materials. It provides decorative materials, such as flat film, blister film, and cover film for various fields of industrial space decoration, such as interior doors, wall panels, custom cabinets, floors, integrated ceilings, etc. The company also provides automotive decoration materials comprising car dashboard, car color panel, car seat, and car sun visior/blind, as well as functional films comprising cold lamination film, soft film ceiling, electrostatic film, car color change film, label film, and medicine plate film. The company was founded in 2000 and is based in Foshan, China.
